subject: Re: Kerberos Ticket and Share
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

ninjabytes wrote:

> is it possible to have samba take my kerberos tickets and log in using
> these credentials to my shares? 

Not currently.  But any user-sapoce app built on top of
libsmbclient (e.g nautilus) will work.






jerry
